sub_title: Collaborative Manufacturing Europe Home Care Lead Buyer at Unilever
summary:
A procurement professional in the FMCG retail industry. 

Has experience in the sourcing process of private label products on behalf of the top 9 European food retailers (among them Albert Heijn (NL), Morrisons (UK), Salling group (DE, DK, PL), Delhaize (BE), Migros (CH) & ICA (SWE)) representing 15.200 stores realising € 100 billion retail sales in 21 countries.

Currently working at Unilever as Lead Buyer for Home Care Europe.

I truly believe in my self-written quote: 
“With strong willpower, you can achieve anything”.

awards.title: TOP 5 (of the 30) for creating a Business Model for Translink at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam
ING - VU Top 4 - (Consumer) Marketing Strategy
awards.description:
ING has collaborated with VU students as consultants to improve their mobile app feature Payment Request (Betaalverzoek) with a broader goal of investigating their marketing strategy in the B2C market.

My team was chosen among the top 2 out of 30 groups (180 students).

Member of the winning team:

- Caron Timmermans
- Jacqueline Tarisch
- Mark Kramers
- Yacintha van der Zee
- Ezraela Macolonie

awards.title: First Prize Business Model Innovation Contest with "The House Of Rez ©"
awards.description:
Developing a business model that attracts and sustains women in top positions, millenials and diversity to/in the Rezidor Hotel Group.


Member of the winning team:

- Merel van Lonkhuijzen
- Chantelle Hofland
- Isabelle Chow
- Xochitl de Groot
- Ezraela Macolonie
awards.issuer: Hotelschool The Hague & Rezidor Hotel Group

profile_positions.title: Collaborative Manufacturing Home Care Europe Lead Buyer
Procurement Assistant Collaborative Manufacturing Europe Beauty & Personal Care

profile_positions.description:
AMS Sourcing is an Schiphol-based, non-profit, strategic-buying alliance that currently works on behalf of 9 top European food retailers (among them Albert Heijn (NL), Morrisons (UK), Salling group (DE, DK, POL), Delhaize (BE), Migros (CH) & ICA (SWE)) representing 15.200 stores realising € 100 billion retail sales in 21 countries. 

My responsibilities included:
•	Directly supporting multiple Procurement Managers on sourcing high-quality private and supplier label FMCG products on an international scale. 
•	The FMCG products were spreaded over 22 projects over the course of 3,5 years: 
o	Non & Near Food: Bags, Foils & Filters, Batteries, Cat Litter, Pet Food Snacks, Candles & Tealights, Health & Beauty Care, Household Cleaning Tools, Wet Wipes, Household Cleaners and Detergents, Cotton, Fempro, and Adult Incontinence.
o	Food: Sugar, Sugar Confectionary, Beer & Cider, Spirits
•	Supported the Procurement Managers on managing and determining the strategy of each project. 
•	Coordinated and supported on joint sourcing activities, the tendering process,subsequent analysis of prices, e-auctions, supplier discussions and visits.
•	Analysed the market (cost price breakdowns, raw materials) and competitor trends within each of the projects. 
•	Highlighted new NPD opportuinties and category optimization. 
•	Searched and introduced potential new (international) suppliers to shareholders. 
•	Developed and approved suppliers per project through sampling with internal and external stakeholders (shareholders and suppliers).  
•	Prepared and participated in pan-European Buyers Meetings
•	Developed together with a team the new AMS Corporate Identity in terms of PowerPoint presentations with knowledge of my MSc Marketing degree.
•	Coached and trained new employees
profile_positions.title: Strategic Buying Alliance EU Trade Associate Food and Non & Near Food

company.name: KLM Royal Dutch Airlines Inflight Services

profile_positions.description:
During my education at Hotelschool The Hague, a school recognized as one of the Top 5 of the best Hotelschools worldwide, I have executed a management placement at the KLM Royal Dutch Airlines in the Division Procurement. In this division, I was assistant project buyer in the commodity Catering Outstations. 

My responsibilities included:

•	Developing a Strategic Advice on the procurement administration of menu specifications. 
•	Developing a Commodity Plan: strategy for 2016 under guidance of three (senior) project buyers
•	Daily contact with suppliers in the regions: 
        -  North and Central America
- South America
- Middle East
- Africa & Asia
- Europe

•	Communication and collaboration with AIRFRANCE
•	Optimising and structuring procurement activities and information streams
•	Updating and/or optimising contracts and the associated administration and menu specifications.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Project Buyer Catering Outstations

profile_positions.description:
During my education at Hotelschool The Hague, a school recognized as one of the Top 5 of the best Hotelschools worldwide,  I have executed a practical placement at the Aruba Marriott Resort & Stellaris Casino. Here, I have worked in the Purchasing Department as Purchasing Assistant.

My responsibilities included:

•	Voluntary leadership role by guidance, instruction and assisting the team of storeroom employees
•	Assisting Procurement Director and Head Buyer with the weekly purchasing of Food and Beverage products for:
- 1052 rooms
- 15 F&B facilities

•	Communication with the Food & Beverage Director, supervisors and restaurant managers of all 15 F&B outlets on their daily requisitions
•	Improvement of current standard processes and practices
•	Inventory Management and Quality Management
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Assistant
